mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_device(user_customer_id, token, refreshed_at, state, logged_in) VALUES(#{userCustomerId}, #{token}, NOW(), #{state}, #{loggedIn})
INSERT INTO customer_alert_log(user_customer_id, title, body, created_at) VALUES(#{userCustomerId}, #{title}, #{body}, NOW())
